title: asawale
author: asawale
content: Revoke cash just put up a warning post not interact with ANY dApps until further notice of safe. It is said to appears that a commonly used web3 connector has been compromised which allows for injection of malicious code affecting numerous dApps. Including revoke.cash. Please stay safe and not get scammed of your hard earned funds

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: Yes. This is true.I already made a thread about it here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5477887.msg63324084#msg63324084The connector that was compromised is the Ledger Wallet ConnectKit Library that is used in almost all dapps in web3 has been Compromised. The npm package was compromised and at such, malicious drainer was added.PS: Until Ledger publishes a post-mortem, it is considered unsafe to interact with any and all dapps.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: This season is always a bad time for everyone especially getting close to bull run there will be lots of scammers trying to launch phishing site to attack dApp users especially those who uses dex to swap and do some kind of trading.For better security it's better to have another wallet created before connection to any site maybe to secure main wallet were there is funds in order not to be hacked.

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: The rate of scam these days is very alarming and we need to be very careful for those of use that love to use dapp everytime anytime we want to trade in the market. It is very important for us to keep to every warning because this can safe us from stress and prevent us from falling victim to the hands of scammers losing our entire funds. Everyone need to be aware of this information to safe a lot people from losing their entire wealth in cryptocurrency.
